content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I recently executed the "read_file" command and received information about the AI\'s goals and role from the "atlas.yaml" file. My computer returned the STDOUT and STDERR of the execute_shell command, which listed all the files in the current directory and their permissions. I was warned not to execute the "list_files" command again with the same arguments.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://www.bostonreview.net/articles/peter-godfrey-smith-being-octopus/", "https://www.bbc.com/future/article/20220720-do-octopuses-feel-pain", "https://www.supersummary.com/the-benefits-of-being-an-octopus/summary/", "https://www.goodreads.com/en/book/show/35890044", "https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/fnsys.2022.840022/full", "https://www.curiouscitydpw.com/curiouscitydpw/wp/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Benefits-Being-Octopus-Ed-Guide.pdf", "https://www.lynchburg.edu/wp-content/uploads/the-prism/Prism-prose19.pdf", "https://www.nhm.ac.uk/discover/octopuses-keep-surprising-us-here-are-eight-examples-how.html"]'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.bostonreview.net/articles/peter-godfrey-smith-being-octopus/", "question": "What does being an octopus mean?"}}}'}]
"""
